pkgmetadata.longdescription: Pixar Animation Studios USD - Universal Scene Description

use.flag: Enable support for OpenImageIO using media-libs/openimageio
Enable support for OpenColorIO using media-libs/opencolorio
Enable support for ptex textures using media-libs/ptex
Enable support for embree using media-libs/embree
Enable support for alembic files using media-gfx/alembic
Enable support for HDF5 encoding in alembid files using media-gfx/albemic[hdf5]
Support for Pixar's Renderman you will need to set the PRMAN_LOCATION environment variable when using this flag
Build Maya plugin, you will need to set MAYA_LOCATION environment variable when using this flag
Build Katana plugin, you will need to set KATANA_API_LOCATION environment variable when using this flag
Build Houdini plugin, you will need to set HOUDINI_LOCATION environment variable when using this flag
